nodes.text: The Officers' Club was a restricted lounge in which the officers of the Grand Army of the Republic could enjoy moments of relaxation during the Clone Wars. It was located in the Jedi Temple of Coruscant, headquarters of the Jedi Order. A band led by an Ortolan nalargon player often performed there, and so did a Human dancer. A dimly lit room, the Officers' Club also featured arcade games and a bar. Various trophies were displayed on shelves, and a damaged Delta-7 Aethersprite-class light interceptor was left hanging from the ceiling as a decoration.
